cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../../../../cmake")
include(Reprojucer)


if(NOT DEFINED JuceDemo_jucer_FILE)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "JuceDemo_jucer_FILE must be defined")
endif()

get_filename_component(JuceDemo_jucer_FILE
  "${JuceDemo_jucer_FILE}" ABSOLUTE
  BASE_DIR "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}"
)


jucer_project_begin(
  PROJECT_FILE "${JuceDemo_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "sBBIzr"
)
